A player from Malaga pulled an opponent down, forcing the referee to blow his whistle. It's a free kick to Real Madrid, but they probably won't attempt a direct shot on goal from here.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Today's referee Jesus Gil Manzano rightly decides to book Michael Santos (Malaga) for his harsh tackle.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Alvaro Morata (Real Madrid) is coming onto the pitch as Karim Benzema cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) receives a pass inside the box, controls the ball and drills it towards the left post. Unfortunately for him, Idriss Carlos Kameni makes a great save to stop his effort.

annotations.description: Marcelo Romero has decided to substitute Adalberto Penaranda and he is replaced by Michael Santos (Malaga).

annotations.description: Jesus Gil Manzano shows a yellow card to Ignacio Camacho (Malaga) for a tough tackle.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner, taken by Toni Kroos (Real Madrid), comes to nothing.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) has a great chance inside the six yard box, shoots to the left side of the goal, but Idriss Carlos Kameni pulls off an exquisite save to deny him. It will be a corner kick for Real Madrid.

annotations.label: substitution

annotations.description: The resulting corner from Juanpi (Malaga) is cleared.

Juan Carlos (Malaga) takes the ball, nicely zig zags through the defence, but his shot to the left post is smartly dealt with by Keylor Navas. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Malaga.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Juanpi (Malaga) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a strong shot into the top of the net. His attempt was beyond the reach of Keylor Navas, so the score changes to 2:1.
Juan Carlos (Malaga) zig zags his way into the box and fails to direct a shot inside the left post. The goalkeeper pulls off a miraculous stop.
The linesman signals that Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) is offside and the referee confirms the decision.

annotations.description: Juanpi (Malaga) takes the corner but it's cleared.

The game is interrupted as Lucas (Real Madrid) is flagged offside.
Nacho (Real Madrid) is disappointed with himself because he got into a good area but produced a poor cross.
Adalberto Penaranda (Malaga) sends a sweet pass into the penalty area, but one of the defenders averts the danger.
Recio (Malaga) unleashes a shot from the edge of the box, but it goes straight at Keylor Navas.
The linesman raises his flag for offside before Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) heads on.

We've seen some beautiful football and interesting action from both sides in the first half, let's see what the second one will bring. The hosts are enjoying a clear advantage over the opposition. Both teams are attempting to play possession football.

Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) will take the free kick.
Roberto Rosales (Malaga) tackles a bit over zealously and Jesus Gil Manzano blows for a foul. That's a free kick to Real Madrid.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Toni Kroos sent in a fine cross from the corner kick. The perfect pass found Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) and his bullet header from around the penalty spot went straight into the top left corner. It's 1:0.

Juanpi (Malaga) crosses the ball into the box from a free kick, but his attempt is well judged by the keeper who saves comfortably.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) whips in a cross from the corner, but Idriss Carlos Kameni is well positioned and punches the ball away.

Chory Castro (Malaga) shows good awareness deep inside the box as he latches on to a cross from the resulting free kick. He jumps high but his towering header lacks a little bit of accuracy and flies inches wide of the left hand post.

Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) latches on to a cross on the edge of the box, but his effort on goal goes well wide of the right post. A really poor shot.

Lucas (Real Madrid) wasted a huge opportunity! The fans already began to celebrate as he produced a shot from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort. The ball went towards the right side of the goal, but Idriss Carlos Kameni made an astonishing save!
Jesus Gil Manzano blows his whistle and signals a foul after Juanpi (Malaga) brought his opponent down.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) sends a long ball in, but Idriss Carlos Kameni comfortably gathers the ball.

Pablo Fornals (Malaga) connected with a pass around the edge of the box, aimed and shot. His attempt went low towards the middle of the target, but Keylor Navas was alert and the score remained the same.

That was a nice football moment. Chory Castro (Malaga) receives an amazing defence splitting low pass on the edge of the box and blasts the ball towards the left post. Keylor Navas guesses his intention and dives superbly to deny him with a remarkable save!
A cross is clipped into the penalty area by Roberto Rosales (Malaga) but poses no threat.

OFF THE POST! Chory Castro (Malaga) runs towards the goal to give his teammate support. He receives a fantastic pass and shoots from the edge of the box, but it crashes against the right post. It could have been a brilliant goal, unlucky.

Half chance! Lucas (Real Madrid) plays a pass into the box, but Idriss Carlos Kameni reacts well to snuff out the attack.
